actions.text: When dropping a DragDrop object, it will snap to any DropOff that shares DropOffName value with it.

children.functionDescription: Reset all buttons of a specific ActivationEffect to "Active".

functionParameters.name: pUID
functionParameters.comment: UID of the button to activate.

functionParameters.name: pX
functionParameters.comment: X-coordinate at which to spawn the PathTarget.

functionParameters.name: pY
functionParameters.comment: Y-coordinate at which to spawn the PathTarget.
